EmailTemplate.subject: Directions from the Airport to the Sheraton for {!Training__c.Account__c} {!Training__c.Account_Number__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Training__c.Training_Contact__c},
Here are some directions for you from MCI (Kansas City International Airport) to the Sheraton. Please call if you need further assistance. The ride is about 30-40 minutes drive based on traffic.
Sheraton Suites Country Club Plaza 770 W 47th Street Kansas City, Missouri 64112 Phone: (816) 931-4400
VinSolutions 5700 Broadmoor Suite 900 Overland Park, KS 66202 (913) 825-6124
From the Airport to the Sheraton:
Google Map
Exit the airport on Cookingham Drive and get on highway I-29/US-71 South
Follow I-29/US-71 South to US-169 South
Continue South over the Missouri River. You will pass the KC Downtown Airport.
Turn Left onto W 6th St. Stay to the left and get on I-35 N / I-70 E / US-24 E
Stay to the right on the highway and take the exit for US-71 S.
Follow US-71 South (approx 3 ½ miles) to the exit for Euclid Ave / Emanuel Cleaver II Blvd / Swope Pkwy. It’s right after the exit for 39th St. Take a right at the first light, Emanuel Cleaver II Blvd.
Follow Emanuel Cleaver II Blvd for approx 1 ½ mile. The street will be called W 47th St once you cross Brookside Blvd.
This is a set of lights right before you enter the Plaza. There will be a fountain on the right and tennis courts on the left. Once you enter the Plaza, PF Chang’s is on the right hand corner. Another noteworthy feature to be sure you’re in the correct area is a white statue of a man in front of PF Chang’s.
Continue through the Plaza approx ½ a mile. It will seem like a long drive since it’s usually packed. The Sheraton is on the right after Jefferson St.
Turn right onto Summit street, goes uphill. There will be a parking garage here. You can park in the front circle and unload first if you’d like. Both on the right.
